<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.02
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Identity

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the pitch of a persons voice.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> person '''setPitch''' pitch

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> person: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pitch: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>unit1 [[setPitch]] 0.5;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[pitch]], [[setIdentity]]
</value></part></template>
